articles.description: A list of all the horoscope signs (Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, Pisces) and their weekly horoscopes, by the Cut’s astrologer Madame Clairevoyant.
articles.content: Between the start of a new astrological year, the Aries new moon, and lots of planets moving into new signs, the last couple weeks have been full of motion and change. This week should feel a bit les… [+7531 chars]

articles.author: Jacqueline Lindenberg
articles.title: Lea Michele shares that her two-year-old son is 'not out of the woods' yet after being hospitalized - Daily Mail
articles.description: The star had missed shows to focus on her family, but stated on Friday that she would return to her leading role as Fanny Brice over the weekend.
articles.content:
Lea Michele updated her fans on the status of her two-year-old's health on Saturday via her Instagram stories after he was hospitalized earlier this week.
